Sentencas: Shipping contributes 4.5% to global CO2 emissions and is not covered by the Kyoto Agreement.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: One method of reducing CO2 emissions on land is combined cooling heating and power (CCHP) or trigeneration, with typical combined thermal efficiencies of over 80%.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: Large luxury yachts are seen as an ideal entry point to the off-shore market for this developing technology considering its current high cost.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: This paper investigates the feasibility of combining a SOFC-GT system and an absorption heat pump (AHP) in a trigeneration system to drive the heating ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) and electrical base-load systems.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: A thermodynamic model is used to simulate the system, with various configurations and cooling loads.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: Measurement of actual yacht performance data forms the basis of this system simulation.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: It is found that for the optimum configuration using a double effect absorption chiller in Ship 1, the net electric power increases by 47% relative to the electrical power available for a conventional SOFC-GT-HVAC system.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: This is due to more air cooled to a lower temperature by absorption cooling; hence less electrical cooling by the conventional HVAC unit is required.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: The overall efficiency is 12.1% for the conventional system, 34.9% for the system with BROAD single effect absorption chiller, 43.2% for the system with double effect absorption chiller.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: This shows that the overall efficiency of a trigeneration system is far higher when waste heat recovery happens.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications

Sentencas: The desiccant wheel hardly reduces moisture from the outdoor air due to a relative low mass flow rate of fuel cell exhaust available to dehumidify a very large mass flow rate of HVAC air, Hence, desiccant wheel is not recommended for this application.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine trigeneration system for marine applications
